epitech.title: Epitech Projects
epitech.description: During my first year of studies, I had the opportunity to work on several academic projects that, despite being part of a general programming curriculum, already demonstrated my keen interest in web development.

1.title: Master's Degree Year 2 (M2), Expert in Technologies

2.title: Master's Degree Year 1 (M1), International Business and Software Engineering

process.title: Making my imagination work, that’s my nindô
process.presentation: For many years, I have been dedicated to developing reliable digital solutions, positioning myself as a full-stack developer. My journey at Epitech provided me with extensive problem-solving training and expertise in programming across various languages and projects. Additionally, my unique background has enabled me to gain significant experience in graphic design, defining me as a creative coder, far beyond the traditional role of a web integrator.

conception.title: Conception
conception.description: Do you have an ambitious project? Need an MVP? With my graphic sensitivity, I can design modern mockups with effective UI/UX, and also take on unique projects (including 3D integration, for example), while advising you on the feasibility of your ideas.

development.title: Development
development.description: Whether it's for a website, a mobile application, or even a software solution, I can identify the most recent and appropriate technologies for your project. I favor an approach that values quality and scalability.

deployment.title: Deployment
deployment.description: I offer a complete deployment service to ensure the proper launch and optimal operation of your solution. I handle hosting, server configuration, performance optimization, security, and the management of all technical aspects.

contact.title: Let’s keep in touch
contact.description: Would you like to contact me for a project or a job opportunity? Schedule a meeting with me by selecting a time slot below.
